title: Login Issue
description: User tries to login with the correct username and password but keeps receiving authentication errors. The issue prevents access to the dashboard and affects daily workflow. Needs urgent investigation.

title: Page Loading Slow
description: Dashboard page takes an unusually long time to load on multiple browsers. Users report delays of several minutes, which disrupts normal operations. Performance optimization is required.

title: Password Reset
description: Users request password resets but never receive the reset emails. Spam folders have been checked. This issue affects multiple users and prevents account recovery. Immediate fix needed.

title: UI Bug in Form
description: On mobile devices, the form's submit button overlaps with input text fields. Users find it difficult to fill and submit forms correctly. The layout needs mobile-friendly adjustments.

title: Error 500 on Checkout
description: When users attempt to checkout items in the cart, the server intermittently returns a 500 Internal Server Error. This prevents order completion and affects sales. Urgent backend fix required.

title: Notification Not Working
description: Users report that push notifications are not arriving on their devices. The issue affects both Android and iOS platforms and prevents timely alerts for important events.

title: Incorrect Pricing
description: Several product pages are displaying incorrect prices, different from the prices set in the backend system. This could cause confusion for customers and potential revenue loss.

title: Broken Link
description: The link to the FAQ page from the main menu redirects users to a 404 Not Found page. Users cannot access help or support information. Needs urgent correction.

title: Email Template Issue
description: Marketing emails appear broken in Gmail, affecting the layout, images, and overall presentation. This compromises brand consistency and user experience. Templates need review and fix.

title: App Crash on Android
description: Android users report that opening the settings page in the mobile app causes immediate crashes. Users cannot change preferences or access settings. Requires urgent debugging and patch.

title: Data Export Fails
description: Exporting large datasets as CSV fails midway, resulting in incomplete files or error messages. Users need reliable export functionality for reporting and analytics purposes.

title: Search Not Returning Results
description: The search function does not return relevant results for valid queries, making it difficult for users to find necessary information. Search algorithm and indexing may need improvement.
